brief_description: A painful tender swelling at the edge of eyelid caused by kapha and rakta predominance
Inflammatory condition of conjunctiva with discharge and redness
Ulcerative lesion of cornea associated with pain and photophobia
Unilateral facial paralysis due to vata disturbance
Loss of wrist extension due to radial nerve involvement
Seizure disorder with loss of consciousness and aura
Peripheral nerve damage secondary to diabetes
Rise in body temperature due to imbalance of doshas affecting Agni
